attributes.action: Stop charging elderly people for TV licences.
attributes.background: Stop charging the elderly for TV licences

rejection.details:
Since 2018 the BBC has been responsible for any costs associated with providing free TV licences, so deciding to grant free TV licences to people over a certain age would be a matter for the BBC, not the Government or House of Commons.

However, we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Fund free TV licences for the over 70 year old: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549178
